class.name: EditorToaster
class.brief_description: Manages toast notifications within the editor.
class.description: This object manages the functionality and display of toast notifications within the editor, ensuring timely and informative alerts are presented to users. [b]Note:[/b] This class shouldn't be instantiated directly. Instead, access the singleton using [method EditorInterface.get_editor_toaster].

method.name: push_toast
method.description: Pushes a toast notification to the editor for display.

constants.constant: Toast will display with an INFO severity.
Toast will display with a WARNING severity and have a corresponding color.
Toast will display with an ERROR severity and have a corresponding color.
